title: kamalappada malariNai
sahitya:
kamalappada malariNai maravAdE pazhani vAzh murugan


anupallavi

  mumalap-paDukuzhi vizhundiravAdE piravAmai tarum oru mUrti
 karuNai sheyyumUrti ena amarar kIrtanam shei kArtikEyan tiruk


caraNam 1    arumAnava jananam eDuttum avamE nAL kazhindhu viDin
 varumA shiridum sukha anubhavamE tirumAl maruganE sharavaNabhavanE
 dEva dEvanE ena  cintai sheyya vandirangu kandan
 shen shaDaipparan kuzhandai shen-
  caraNam 3    varuvAr evar peruvazhik-kudavi sheya arivizhandanaiyE
 iruvAdanai toDarumE allal sheya karuvAsalin varu tuyar marandAyE
 turandAyE aanerik-karai kaDanda mAdar pOla yAn pughalurai
 kaDandu vari tuzhal manamE
   caraNam 4    dishaiyE tirindizhidozhil sheyyaadE avananri aNuvum ashaiyAdenu
 maru mozhi poyyaadE ashaiyA-danavaradamum aDi tozhuvAi ayanum
 virumbum padam pealAm atIta Ananda bhOgam aduvAmE inbam rAmadAsan paNi
